Markets

Wind & Site, one-click away.

Wind farm development is a challenging process where critical decissions have to be taken. Vortex will cost-effectively help you taking some of them.

Forecast, like it will be in the future.

Once your wind farm has already been built, the past does not longer matter. Vortex forecast service will asses you about next week, season or decades wind.

Solar radiation, beam the information to your project.

Sun irradiation touches every site on Earth but scattered by many diffusive agents. Vortex helps you narrowing uncertainty on site-specific solar energy resources with the best blend of ground measurements, remote sensing and atmospheric modeling technologies.

Off-shore, treated on-line.

Ocean is hard but Metocean technology can be soft. Access to Vortex wind & waves estimations from your desktop

References, what do these companies have in common?

Either if they are wind farm developers, wind turbine manufacturers or specialized consultants, if they operate windfarms or trade with wind energy, if they deal with projects on or off-shore... all them consume wind and sea data from around the globe.
